name: Viking Heroes 4
description:
HISTORY:

Join the Viking heroes and gods in a race against time to save the world from eternal darkness. As the sun and moon falter and Fenrir, the giant wolf, threatens to consume them, the Vikings must travel across realms to forge a new and magical chain that can capture him. However, the journey will not be easy as they face dangerous enemies, including Fenrir's sons, despicable forces that watch their every move. With the help of the gods, they will embark on a quest filled with action and adventure across various realms to restore light to the world. But even after capturing Fenrir, the Vikings will have to decide whether to show mercy or punish the beast for his actions. Download and play now to find out!



GAME FEATURES:

In Viking heroes 4, as in any time manager you have to accurately calculate the time for building, collecting resources and timely use of bonuses.

The game has a large variety of buildings and unique items, collecting them you will perform tasks and participate in unique adventures.

Create heroes and fight monsters from Scandinavian mythology, giants, huge wolves, ghosts and more are waiting for you.



At its core, Viking heroe 4 is a classic time manger with base building and level resource gathering. To perform at your best, you need to time and give strategic orders to your characters. Each level can be completed for 3 stars, for this you need to complete all tasks as quickly as possible in the timer. The game has 60 elaborate levels and 3 difficulties.



• 60 captivating levels
• Three difficulty modes: Easy, Normal and Hard
• A wide range of achievements
• Exciting mini-games
• Intuitive gameplay with simple mouse actions
• Step-by-step gameplay guide
